Singed.name: Singedº
Singed.title: ºøthe Mad Chemistº
Singed.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSinged descended from a long line of Zaun's revered chemists. Even in his youth, his talent for concocting potions far outstripped that of his peers, and he quickly distinguished himself from his less extraordinary chemist compatriots. It came as no surprise to anyone when he was selected for apprenticeship by the infamous Warwick, master apothecary on a lucrative retainer with the Noxian military during their campaign against Ionia. Within Warwick's laboratories, Singed toiled without end, rapidly absorbing every detail of his predecessor's deadly craft. Singed had little concern for the death and destruction that was the fruit of his labors. By the time the curse of lycanthropy descended to claim his master, Singed was poised and eager to make the transition from workhorse to innovator; he was ready to share his genius by bringing a new brand of suffering to the Ionian front. His zeal for progress was unquenchable, and when suitable test subjects proved to be in short supply, the eager chemist was often thought to turn his volatile mixtures on his own flesh.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºWhen the uneasy peace created by the League of Legends settled on the world, Singed journeyed to the one place where he was still able to showcase his beloved craft: the Institute of War. By this time he was barely even a man, his body both ruined and sustained by his ingenious craft. A thousand burns - accidents of shadow and flame - mar his ravaged form, and exposure to such harsh conditions has deadened his nerves, hardened his body, and strengthened his physique, transforming him into a veritable juggernaut. This, combined with a formidable arsenal of deadly concoctions, makes Singed a force to be reckoned with on the Fields of Justice.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøº''My deadliest dose shall bear my patron's name!''ºøºøº
ºøºøºø-- Singed, having just christened the Insanity Potionºøºøº
Singed.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøSinged descended from a long line of Zaun's revered chemists. Even in his youth, his talent for concocting potions far outstripped that of his ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøPoison Trail is very effective at farming and harassing, allowing Singed to dominate the flow of whatever lane he's in.øºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøUse Insanity Potion to trick your opponents into chasing you through your Poison Trail.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøFlinging enemies into your tower can deal heavy amounts of damage to them.ºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøKeep your distance to avoid being Flung back into Singed's allies.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºSinged needs to run close to your team to be effective. Try to take advantage of this by using crowd control effects on him while attacking his allies.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºBe careful when chasing Singed. He's very difficult to bring down, and can leave his Poison Trail to damage you in your pursuit.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºPoison Trailº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøLeaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºToggle: ººøºøSinged lays a poisonous trail that deals øºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage per second.ºøº

spells.name: ºøMega Adhesiveº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøThrows a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing enemies who walk on it.ºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøLeaves a sticky area on the ground for øºøº{{ e2 }}ºøºø seconds, slowing enemies in the area by øºøº{{ e1 }}º% (lasts º{{ e3 }}ºø second after leaving).ºøº

spells.name: Flingº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºDamages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed.ºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºSinged flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage.º

spells.name: ºøInsanity Potionº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøSinged drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.øºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøSinged drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him ºøºøº{{ e1 }}ºøºøºøºøºø Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regeneration, and Mana Regeneration for øºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}º seconds.º

passive.name: ºøEmpowered Bulwarkº
passive.description: ºøºøºøIncreases Singed's Health by 25 for every 100 Mana he has.øºøºøº
